section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Financial institution holding company" means a financial institution whose only activities are:
the maintenance and management of intangible investments; and
the collection and distribution of income from intangible investments.

text.section: Notwithstanding § 10-402 of this subtitle, interest received by a financial institution holding company from one of its subsidiary corporations that is a financial institution shall be allocated to this State only to the extent that the interest is derived from the trade or business of the subsidiary corporation within this State.
